artist_names: The Orion Experience, ORION, Linda XO

26 contributorsobsessed with you lyricsverse 1
ive got your picture on my wall
i dream about you when i sleep
i go out of my way everyday just hoping that
ill catch you walking down your street
i know just where you went to school
i know the names of all your friends
ive got it bad again
an obsession

they cannot see my point of view

that im obsessed with you

yeah i love all the things you do

cause im obsessed with you
cause im obsessed with you
you might also likeverse 2

the very mention of your name

i need you more than oxygen
ive got it bad again
an obsession
